pr_title: issue #564 and #584 - package fhir-swagger-generator as executable jar

timeline.message:
issue #564 - package fhir-swagger-generator as executable jar

Previously, this package really only worked from the development
environment. Now, its possible to download and execute the jar file
directly.

I also updated fhir-openapi with the updated openapi.json (based on the
new order of data types coming from ModelSupport).

I also updated the Usage docs in fhir-swagger-generator/README.

Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant <lmsurpre@us.ibm.com>

Remove jakarta.json-api dependency

While generating the shaded jar, I noticed warnings for overlapping
class names between `jakarta.json` and `jakarta.json-api`.

Originally, we had `jakarta.json-api` depdencies so that we can use the
applicaiton server's javax.json instead of shipping our own, but now
there is a mix of both.

To resolve, I removed all traces of `jakarta.json-api` since we weren't
even using it right (it should have been "provided" scope and not
"compile" scope).

Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant <lmsurpre@us.ibm.com>

issue #584 - specify charset for the swagger/openapi JsonWriter

This should force it to use UTF-8.

Signed-off-by: Lee Surprenant <lmsurpre@us.ibm.com>
